org.drip.spline.bspline

Class TensionProcessedBasisHat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.function1D.AbstractUnivariate
      • org.drip.spline.bspline.TensionBasisHat
        • org.drip.spline.bspline.TensionProcessedBasisHat

  • public class TensionProcessedBasisHat
extends TensionBasisHat
    TensionProcessedBasisHat implements the processed hat basis function of the form laid out in the basic framework outlined in Koch and Lyche (1989), Koch and Lyche (1993), and Kvasov (2000) Papers.
